component.type: type of the component. VALUES: activity, service, receiver, or provider
component.requiredPrmToAccess: The required permission to access this component, i.e., other components must have this permission to be able to communicate with this component.
component.providerReadPermission: if the component is a ContentProvider, then this is the required pemrission to read data from this ContentProvider.
component.providerWritePermission: if the component is a ContentProvider, then this is the required pemrission to modify the data contained in this ContentProvider.
component.providerAuthority: if this component is a ContentProvider, then this is the URI for this content provider
